name: rise-reveal
description: original reveal.js patched for use within the RISE Jupyter extension

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && for target in copy patch; do npm run $target; done
scripts.copy: mkdir -p export; cp -r node_modules/reveal.js/ ./export/reveal.js/; cp -r node_modules/reveal.js-plugins/chalkboard ./export/reveal.js-chalkboard/
scripts.patch: for target in patch-reveal-css patch-notes patch-themes patch-chalkboard ; do npm run $target; done
